actions.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Education to extend the same level of increased flexibility to all rural local educational agencies under part A of title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.
short_title: Rural Education Equality and Improvement Act of 2009

summary.text: Rural Education Equality and Improvement Act of 2009 - Directs the Secretary of Education to extend to all rural local educational agencies (LEAs) the same level of increased flexibility that the Secretary extends to any category of rural LEAs regarding their compliance with requirements under part A of title I (Improving the Academic Achievement of the Disadvantaged) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

titles.title: Rural Education Equality and Improvement Act of 2009

To direct the Secretary of Education to extend the same level of increased flexibility to all rural local educational agencies under part A of title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.
